QuestData.Title: Free the Dissenters
QuestData.Description: Not all of my fellow villagers from Inkgill are corrupted. Many heeded my warnings and did not drink of the sha-tainted waters.$b$bThey are in hiding, terrified, and intimidated by the guards.$b$bPlease, tell them there is hope! Go into the village to the north. Speak with them and send them to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue 6 Inkgill Dissenters in Inkgill Mere.
QuestData.CompletionText: If we can rescue the dissenters, perhaps we can rebuild somewhere else...
QuestData.RewardText: Though we may not seem like much, from these inauspicious beginnings I know we will rebuild. Thank you, friend.
